definition.text: Situation name features the name of the situation that triggered a certain event, which is dependent on the context.

paragraphs.text: In the context of a strategy, it is the name of the situation that triggered-on the strategy.
In the context of a position, it's the name of the situation that triggered the take position event.
In the context of an order, it's the situation that triggered the create order event.
initialValue allows resetting the initial state of the node to an arbitrary value.
